Product
short Description
"Bible of Chemistry", conveys the textbook on inorganic chemistry, both fundamental and material knowledge of inorganic and organometallic chemistry. With the 102nd Support is after extensive remodeling of the previous edition created a new work, which is intended to fully consider and prepare for future reference. Inserted highlights the numerous discoveries in chemistry in recent years include the core physical, multiple bond systems, element cluster compounds, nitrogen compounds, and the element of super heavy elements. All chapters that deal with the molecular, solid state, organometallic, bioinorganic, and technical core of the 114 known chemical elements have been brought with considered literature until 2006, on the cutting edge of science. - This text refers to an out of print or unavailable edition of this title.
The publisher of the book
* "Three textbooks in one" fundamental principles of chemistry - elements and compounds of inorganic chemistry - Organometallic Chemistry * been added: comprehensive overviews of the halogen and chalcogen compounds of the elements, redesigned summary chapter on the heavy chalcogens, Pentele, Tetrels, trielide and their chemistry, the reorganization of the summary overviews of important compound classes, and another section * available on super-heavy elements as a reference guide to current literature and a detailed index along with an encyclopedic appendix - This text refers to an out of print or unavailable edition of this title.
